contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 10 离职原因 Reasons for Leaving an Employment
面试官亨利先生在询问求职者玛丽的离职原因。

contents.title: 亨利：你曾在当地的一所学校任教一年，是吗？
contents.answer: Henry: You taught at a local school for a year, right?

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，我在那儿是一名英语教师。
contents.answer: Yes, I was there as an English teacher.

contents.title: 亨利：你喜欢教学工作吗？
contents.answer: Henry: Did you enjoy yourself there?

contents.title: 玛丽：当然。我很喜欢那些可爱的孩子们。
contents.answer: Sure. I was fond of those lovely children.

contents.content: 职场中的潜规则和陷阱不少，如何说出让人满意的离职原因值得深思。在面试时不免会被问及离职原因，像上班路途太长、专业不对口、结婚、生病、休假等这些可以为对方接受的原因，是可以如实道来的。但是，有些原因谈起来就要慎重了。

contents.title: 亨利：那么，你为什么决定辞职呢？
contents.answer: Henry: So why did you decide to resign?

contents.title: 玛丽：那所学校有点远。我只是想更好地照顾我年迈的祖父。
contents.answer: The school is a little bit too far away. I simply want to take good care of my elderly grandfather.

contents.title: 亨利：我知道了。那么，你为什么不再当老师了呢？
contents.answer: Henry: I see. But why don't you continue to work as a teacher?

contents.title: 玛丽：我认为迎接生活中新的挑战也不错。
contents.answer: I think it's better for me to meet new challenges in life.

contents.content: 常见的离职原因可能是：人际关系不好处理、收入不合期望、与上司相处不好、工作压力大等。但从用人单位一方来看，这些原因或多或少都是求职者自身的因素，可能会影响将来工作的开展，例如无法妥善处理与同事及客户的人际关系、不能承受竞争压力等，因此最好不要采用。

contents.title: 亨利：那样你可以有更多的发展空间。
contents.answer: Henry: So you can have more room for development.

contents.title: 玛丽：而且我可以体验另一种生活方式。
contents.answer: And I can experience another kind of life style.

contents.title: 亨利：这倒是个好主意。
contents.answer: Henry: It sounds like a good idea.

contents.title: 玛丽：我希望自己可以尽快适应新工作。
contents.answer: I hope I can adapt to the new job as soon as possible.

contents.content: 应当尽量避免或是淡化敏感的答复，如追求更高的收入，更广阔的晋升空间等有可能引起拒绝或是反感的理由，对前雇主也不要有任何负面的评价。当然，这也并不意味着隐瞒和欺骗，如果面试官问及细节问题，可以如实回答，否则求职者的诚信度可能会大打折扣。

contents.title: 1.你为什么决定换工作？
contents.answer: What made you finally decide to change your job?

contents.title: 2.他离职只是因为合同期满。
contents.answer: He left his job simply because of the expiry of his employment contract.

contents.title: 3.这家公司于他而言，似乎没有什么发展前途。
contents.answer: The company seems to have provided no further prospect for development for him.

contents.title: 4.她为了照顾乡下的老祖母而辞职。
contents.answer: She left her last job in order to care for her elderly grandmother in the country.

contents.title: 5.他只是觉得是该接受新的挑战了。
contents.answer: He simply thinks that it is high time for him to meet with a new challenge.

contents.title: 6.她之所以辞职，其实是因为个人原因。
contents.answer: Her resignation is actually for a personal reason.

contents.title: 7.不要因为同一个原因如此频繁地换工作。
contents.answer: Don't change your job so frequently for the same reason.

contents.title: 8.他突然离职让朋友们都很吃惊。
contents.answer: His sudden resignation was a great surprise to his friends.

contents.title: 9.她很遗憾地说自己不得不递交辞呈。
contents.answer: She was sorry to say that she had to submit her resignation.

contents.title: 10.他想找一份工作，方便照顾家人。
contents.answer: He wants to find a job that offers convenience for him to take care of his family.
